title: Mathematics GCSE Group Session
description: A structured group learning session focused on key GCSE Maths topics including algebra, geometry, and problem-solving. Sessions combine concept revision, exam practice, and collaborative exercises to build confidence and accuracy in a supportive peer environment.
learning_outcomes: Strengthen understanding of GCSE Maths core principles
Improve exam technique through timed question drills
Build confidence in problem-solving and analytical thinking

title: English GCSE One-on-One Session
description: A tailored one-on-one tutoring session focused on improving analytical writing, comprehension, and exam preparation for GCSE English Language and Literature. Each session adapts to the client's specific needs, helping them gain clarity, confidence, and precision in their responses.
learning_outcomes: Enhance reading comprehension and textual analysis skills
Improve essay structure and vocabulary usage
Develop exam confidence through practice papers and feedback

title: Multi-Subject Tutor
description: Flexible online tutoring sessions covering Mathematics, English, and Science. Perfect for students who need support across multiple subjects with personalised learning plans adapted to individual strengths and areas for improvement.
learning_outcomes: Strengthen understanding across core academic subjects
Build effective study habits and revision techniques
Develop confidence through regular practice and feedback

title: Science Tutor
description: Expert one-on-one science tutoring covering Biology, Chemistry, and Physics. Sessions are tailored to your learning style and academic goals, helping you master complex concepts and achieve top grades at GCSE and A-Level.
learning_outcomes: Build a deeper understanding of scientific concepts and theories
Develop strong exam techniques and practical application skills
Gain confidence in tackling complex problems and higher-level questions
